hossam.name: Hossam Uddin
hossam.description: Hossam is a final year Mathematics and Statistics student at Queen Mary, University of London. Prior to his studies, Hossam took a gap year where he interned at PwC for 6 months in Tax. In his first year at QMUL, Hossam completed a spring week at JP Morgan, and a summer internship at HSBC in Wealth Management and Commercial Banking. In his second year Hossam completed a summer internship at RBC Capital Markets in the Investment Banking division. Outside of his studies, Hossam plays cricket at a competitive level. For inquiries, please contact via email.

natalia.name: Natalia Trufanova
natalia.description: Natalia is a penultimate year Economics student at Queen Mary, University of London. Before starting university, she completed an apprenticeship in a Russian investment company as a research analyst. In her first year she completed an insight week at Barings, an asset management firm with over $300bn under management. As Vice President, Natalia will be organising and executing society events, she will also head up the Investments team where she will be overseeing our weekly sessions on Equity Research and Financial Modelling.

damodara.name: Damodara Puddu
damodara.description: Damodara is a penultimate year Computer Science student at Queen Mary University of London. He is engaged in projects and research covering Data Science, Quants and Big Data. His tech team will be responsible for organising events in the Fintech space, researching and keeping up to date with related news and mentoring members that want to get into the industry. For inquiries, please contact via email.

luke.name: Luke Griffin
luke.description: Luke is a final year student studying BSc Accounting and Management at Queen Mary, University of London. He has interned at Fitch Ratings, a credit rating agency, in Financial Institutions and Corporates. Luke will be overlooking the finances of QMTIS, as well as teaching in the Investments Team.

aubrey.name: Aubrey Mckinnon
aubrey.description: Aubrey is a 3rd year studying BSc Astrophysics with an interest in quantitative finance, AI and data science. He has interned at Hadleigh PVT, a private equity firm, and has authored articles on topics ranging from the physics of colour to the applications of AI to improve fraud detection for insurance companies. He is the Head of Technology Research for QMTIS.

kayla.name: Kayla Honosutomo
kayla.description: Kayla is currently a third-year studying Marketing and Management. Her interest in Finance emerged after visiting the Chicago Board of Trade in High School, which showcased the fast-paced and dynamic nature of the industry. To explore her interest, she has undergone work experience in companies such as JP Morgan, Bank of America Merrill Lynch, a global FinTech, and a stock brokerage firm.

sofia.name: Sofia Zaffari
sofia.description: Sofia is a 3rd year studying BSc Psychology at Queen Mary, University of London, with an interest in the banking industry. As the Deutsche Bank ambassador, Sofia is hoping to not only recruit strong candidates but also offer opportunities to students to network with the companyâ€™s employers during events. This year, Sofia will contribute to organising socials and promoting upcoming events via social media.

nisha.name: Nisha Sangar
nisha.description: Nisha is a 3rd year BSc Mathematics undergraduate at Queen Mary, University of London. Her interest lies in Sales and Trading with financial experience at Lloyds Banking Group Markets and Qconsult sponsored by JP Morgan. Nisha's main role within QMTIS will be organising talks with professionals from well-known institutions and promoting gender diversity within finance.
